query: SELECT id, sectionId, questionNumber, LEFT(questionText, 80) as questionText FROM complianceQuestions WHERE sectionId IN (SELECT id FROM complianceSections WHERE sectionType = 'staff') ORDER BY sectionId, questionNumber LIMIT 100;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT id, sectionId, questionNumber, LEFT(questionText, 80) as questionText FROM complianceQuestions WHERE sectionId IN (SELECT id FROM complianceSections WHERE sectionType = 'staff') ORDER BY sectionId, questionNumber LIMIT 100;
